=Modeling=
3dsMax users:
  * [http://www.wunderboy.org/sourceapps.php#max9_smd SMD Export]
  * [http://www.wunderboy.org/sourceapps.php#max_vtf VTF (texture) Support]

Everyone:
  * [http://www.wunderboy.org/apps/guistudiomdl2.php GUI StudiMDL, much better than the SDK studio MDL.]
= Texture Artists =
  * [http://www.wunderboy.org/sourceapps.php#vtf_shell VTF shell extensions, (thumbnails in explore)
  * [http://nemesis.thewavelength.net/index.php?p=41 VTF edit, used for conversion of VTF textures]
  * [http://www.gimp.org/ GIMP, free image editing software, very good.]
